WebhookResponse.title: WebhookResponse
WebhookResponse.description: Represents the response received from a webhook or a synchronous API call.

id.description: Unique identifier for the response, typically cpf or provider-cpf.

status.description: The status of the response (e.g., success, error).

message.description: A descriptive message associated with the response.

provider.description: The API provider that generated this response (e.g., v8, facta).

responseBody.description: The full response body received from the API.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the response was stored.

UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Stores user profile information, including their role and status.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Authentication.

role.description: The user's role in the system. The 'admin' role is primarily managed via custom claims.

status.description: The current status of the user's account.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user profile was created.

v8_username.description: Username for the V8 API integration.

v8_password.description: Password for the V8 API integration (should be stored securely).

v8_audience.description: Audience for the V8 API integration.

v8_client_id.description: Client ID for the V8 API integration.

facta_username.description: Username for the Facta API integration.

facta_password.description: Password for the Facta API integration (should be stored securely).

permissions.description: Granular access control for different app features.

canViewFGTS.description: Access to FGTS batch and manual query pages.

canViewCLT.description: Access to CLT credit query pages.

canViewINSS.description: Access to INSS benefit card query pages.

ActivityLog.title: Activity Log
ActivityLog.description: Stores a record of user actions within the application.

userId.description: The UID of the user who performed the action.

userEmail.description: The email of the user for easy reference.

action.description: A description of the action performed (e.g., 'Consulta FGTS - V8').

provider.description: The API provider used for the action (e.g., v8, facta).

documentNumber.description: The document number (CPF) related to the action.

details.description: Additional details about the action, such as a filename or error message.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the action occurred.

BatchJob.title: Batch Job
BatchJob.description: Represents a batch processing job for FGTS queries.

completedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the job finished (completed or errored).

FGTSBalance.title: FGTS Balance
FGTSBalance.description: Represents the result of an FGTS balance check from a single provider.

CLTConsent.title: CLT Consent
CLTConsent.description: Represents the consent term data for a CLT credit consultation.

SimulationConfig.title: Simulation Config
SimulationConfig.description: Configuration for a CLT credit simulation.

SimulationResult.title: Simulation Result
SimulationResult.description: The result of a CLT credit simulation.

InssSimulationRequest.title: INSS Simulation Request
InssSimulationRequest.description: Parameters for simulating INSS benefit card operations.

InssSimulationResult.title: INSS Simulation Result
InssSimulationResult.description: Result of an INSS benefit card operation simulation.

InssCreditOffer.title: INSS Credit Offer
InssCreditOffer.description: Represents an INSS new credit or margin complement offer from Facta.

/webhookResponses/{responseId}.description: Stores API responses. The responseId can be a CPF for V8, or a provider-prefixed ID for others.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profiles. The userId is the same as the Firebase Auth UID.

/activityLogs/{logId}.description: Stores records of user activities for auditing and dashboard metrics.

/batches/{batchId}.description: Stores the state and progress of a batch processing job.
